item.description:
We have been here before and always had a great time.

Weather permitting, I hope that we can sit out side
at the patio.

Parking is kind of hard.
I usually park over by the Milford Green and walk over.

Wish you luck if you are going to try to park closer.

http://www.cafeatlant...

www.cafeatlantique.us/

There will be great coffee and delicious food.

I am planning on going to see Hell Boy Part II later in the
Evening.
That will be a separate Meet Up coming out later on.

There are live bands at the Cafe but I will probably be gone before they start.

Thank you! I hope to see you there!

Many of you have not been to an event for months.

There is a good possibility that starting in November there will be less and
Less events available since so few of you are showing an interest in doing
Anything.
item.how_to_find_us: It is a small location, we can find each other.
item.name: Coffee Talk goes back to Cafe Atlantique on July 26
